tt:div.tt:p:
Malory: THE CHAIRMAN OF THE
U.N. INTELLIGENCE COMMITTEE.

DO YOU NOT EVEN SKIM THE
BRIEFINGS IN YOUR INBOX?

Malory: UTNE DECIDES WHICH
SPY AGENCY GETS THE INSANELY
LUCRATIVE U.N. CONTRACT.

...PROBABLY DON'T KNOW, FOR SIX
YEARS RUNNING, THE CONTRACT HAS
GONE TO ODIN.

THE ORGANIZATION OF DOUCHE BAGS
IN -- IN...
WAIT, I HAD SOMETHING FOR THIS.

Malory: ...THEIR GROUND FLOOR
ISN'T A LAUNDROMAT.

Malory: ISIS NEEDS THAT U.N.
CONTRACT.

SO I AM GOING TO WOO
MR. TORVALD UTNE...

Archer: AND YOU'RE UNINVITING
ME IN ADVANCE?

BUT THIS PARTY IS DIFFERENT AND
VERY IMPORTANT, SO ABSOLUTELY
NOTHING CAN GO WRONG.

Archer: WELL, THEN WE BETTER
KEEP DR. BELLOWS AWAY FROM
JEANNIE.

Malory: NO ONE IS BRINGING A
DATE, SO DON'T YOU BRING A DATE.

Archer: OKAY, BUT I DON'T
WANT TO GET THERE AND BE THE
ONLY ONE WITHOUT A DATE.

Malory: AND I DON'T WANT
ANOTHER ONE OF YOUR SULLEN

WHORES USING MY MEDICINE CABINET
LIKE A...

PEGGY, YOU WILL PROBABLY KILL ME
FOR THIS.

BUT, SENATOR, WE NOW HAVE A
SUBWAY MUSEUM.

IF -- ARE YOU STILL BIG INTO
TRAINS?

WHO PUTS OxyContin IN A XANAX
BOTTLE?

Archer: BUT IF THEY'RE
STEALING PILLS, HOW DOES IT HELP
TO SWITCH THE LABELS?

Malory: BECAUSE THEY CAN'T
READ ENGLISH!

I'M GONNA LEAVE YOU TO THINK
ABOUT THAT WHOLE LINE OF
REASONING...

Archer: ...AND WHATEVER
SCHEME YOU'RE HATCHING FOR THIS
DINNER PARTY.

[ Russian accent ] SO, YOUR
INSTRUCTIONS ARE CLEAR?

BUT, MANI, WHAT ABOUT
THE FANTASTICKS?

IS IT SO RIDICULOUS TO READY
MY BODY FOR THE BABY?!

UTA, PLEASE DO NOT START
THIS.

JUST READY YOUR BODY FOR WORK,
HMM?

THE FIRST, WE MAKE A BIG PHONY
ATTEMPT TO KILL TORVALD UTNE.

Malory: SO, YOUR INSTRUCTIONS
ARE CLEAR?
YOU RING FIRST BELL FOR DINNER.

UND ON SECOND BELL, I COME OUT
ALL JOHN WOOEY, SCREAMING CRAZY
UND SHOOTING BLANKS.

Malory: THEN I THROW MYSELF
IN FRONT OF UTNE, SHIELDING HIM

WITH MY SUPPLE BODY AS YOU'RE
GUNNED DOWN BY ISIS AGENTS.

BECAUSE FOR UTNE TO BUY IT,
EVERYONE MUST ACT SURPRISED.

Malory: OH, I'M SURE THEY
WILL.

MANI, I HAVE A BAD FEELING
FOR THIS.
ONLY I WILL HAVE REAL BULLETS.

THIS IS TAKING CHOCOLATE FROM A
BABY.

WE WON'T GIVE OUR BABY
CHOCOLATE.

THANKS FOR INVITING US TO
YOUR SWANKY DINNER PARTY,
MS. ARCHER.

Pam: YEAH, I COULD GET USED
TO THIS.

YOU'RE ONLY HERE BECAUSE I MAY
NEED YOU TO TAKE ONE FOR THE
TEAM.

TORVALD IS AN INCORRIGIBLE POON
HOUND.

Lana: OH, WELL, UH, THANK
YOU.

MAY I PLEASE CUP ONE IN MY
HAND?

Lana: OOH, SEE, HERE'S THE
THING --

Malory: CYRIL, GO GET SOME
GRAVLAX.

TORVALD, FEEL FREE TO CUP
ANYTHING IN THE ROOM.

OH, YOU WERE TALKING ABOUT MY
GUNS.

IT'S STRANGE THAT YOU'D WEAR
THEM TO A PARTY.

Lana: YOU KNOW, NORMALLY I
WOULDN'T, BUT MALORY --

Malory: BUT THAT'S ISIS FOR
YOU -- ALWAYS PRIMED AND READY
FOR ACTION.

Malory: WHICH IS WHY YOU
SHOULD CONSIDER ISIS FOR THE
U.N. CONTRACT.

OUR AGENTS ARE HIGHLY TRAINED IN
MANY DISCIPLINES.

Malory: NOTHING BUT TOO MUCH
ENTHUSIASM FOR THE OPPORTUNITY
TO SERVE THE U.N.

Malory: CYRIL, IN MY MEDICINE
CABINET -- WAIT, NO!

I'LL HAVE TO GET IT MYSELF,
JUST...

I THINK LANA JUST BROKE
TORVALD'S HAND!

Malory: AND WE WON'T WIN THAT
CONTRACT IF -- WHO ON GOD'S
GREEN EARTH DRESSED YOU?!

I FEEL THAT CARINA BETTER
CAPTURES MY SENSUAL WOMANHOOD.

Archer: YEAH, SHE SO TOTALLY
DOES.
Malory: I SAID NO SUCH THING.

Malory: WELL, YOUR MOUTH
BETTER GET OVER THERE AND MAKE
TORVALD HAPPY!

Malory: REGALE HIM WITH
EXCITING TALES OF ISIS EXPLOITS.

TAKE HIS MIND OFF LANA'S HUGE,
JOHNNY BENCHIAN FINGERS.

Lana: CAN WE GET OFF MY
FINGERS?

Cyril: YEAH, THEY ARE PRETTY
BIG.

Lana: FIRST TIME I'VE HEARD
YOU COMPLAIN.

Archer: I THINK HE'S ALREADY
BEING REGALED.

Pam: BET YOU GET THAT A LOT,
HUH, TORVIE?

GET AWAY FROM ME, YOU
DISGUSTING WOMAN.
SO EVEN PAM GOT A DATE.

Lana: BUT SUAVE MASTER SPY
STERLING ARCHER STANDS ALONE.

AND A VERY HANDSOME CHEESE AT
THAT, SIR!

Archer: I DON'T EVEN KNOW HOW
YOU GOT OUT, WOODHOUSE.
AND I DO HAVE A DATE.
Cyril: YOU DO? WHERE IS SHE?

UH, WITH ALL THAT SEXY EUROPEAN
LINGERIE MODELING TO PAY FOR HER

EUROPEAN MED SCHOOL THAT SHE'S
GOING TO, SHE PROBABLY NEVER HAD
TIME TO LEARN TO DRIVE.

YOU KNOW WHAT SECONDHAND SMOKE
DOES TO A FETUS!

UTA, AFTER WE KILL UTNE, WE
NEED TO HAVE A VERY LONG UND
SERIOUS TALK.
I NEED A PAINKILLER, NOT A...

WHAT IS THAT -- A CALCIUM
SUPPLEMENT?

ISIS IS A DISTANT SECOND TO
ODIN -- VERY DISTANT.

Malory: WELL, WHAT ABOUT THE
GROUNDBREAKING WORK DR. KRIEGER

IS DOING FOR ISIS IN OUR APPLIED
RESEARCH DIVISION?

Pam: YEAH, TELL HIM ABOUT THE
SEX ROBOT!

Pam: BUT IT DOESN'T JUST
FIST.

HE'S A FULLY INTEGRATED,
MULTI-FETISH ARTIFICIAL BEING.

AND THE BEST PART IS THAT HE'S
LEARNING.

ISIS CLEARLY IS NOT THE
AGENCY FOR US!

EXCEPT FOR THE NEGRESS, THE
WOMEN ARE --

Malory: WILLING TO DO
WHATEVER IT TAKES.

Pam: FISTER ROBOTO WOULDN'T
TAKE THAT.
SO IF YOU WILL EXCUSE M--

LET THAT CALCIUM CITRATE SEEP
INTO YOUR BONES.

WITH THAT ADAM'S APPLE, SHE
LOOKS LIKE SHE SWALLOWED A
RUBIK'S CUBE.
YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A DATE?

Archer: THEN WE NEED TO LOCK
DOWN YOUR COVER STORY.
I NEED TO HIT AN ATM.

YOU HAVEN'T EVEN TRIED THE FISH
BALLS.

THERE'S PLENTY OF FISHINESS
GOING ON AT ISIS WITHOUT YOUR
BALLS!

Cyril: MAYBE I SHOULD GO SAY
SOMETHING.

WHERE'S THE DAMN FISH BALLS
ALREADY?
I COULD KILL FOR SOME FOOD.

Lana: SURE IT WOULDN'T BE THE
FIRST TIME.

Lana: NO, I JUST MEANT, LIKE,
SHE LITERALLY KILLED SOMEBODY --

YEAH, I SAW WHERE YOU WERE GOING
WITH THAT.

WHEN I SERVED IN THE KING'S
AFRICAN RIFLES, THE LOCAL

ZAMBEZI TRIBESMEN CALLED HUMAN
FLESH "LONG PIG."

Malory: TORVALD, AT LEAST
STAY FOR DINNER!

I THINK YOU'LL BE VERY SURPRISED
BY --

I DETEST SURPRISES, WHICH IS
WHY THE CONTRACT WILL REMAIN
WITH ODIN.

BUT YOU PROMISED ME
RUBY FOO'S.

JA, I ALSO PROMISED YOU A
BABY.
HOW'S THAT WORKING OUT FOR YOU?

Lana: HEY, DOES THAT COOK
SEEM WEIRD?

Cyril: NORMAL WEIRD OR GERMAN
WEIRD?

Archer: YOU'RE NOT, UM,
LEAVING, ARE YOU?
NOT IF YOU ARE STAYING, MISS...

Archer: YOU KNOW HE'S NOT THE
SHOT-PUTTER, RIGHT?

OF COURSE HE IS NOT THE
SHOT-PUTTER.
BUT I AM SURE HE IS VERY STRONG.

WE JUST NEED TO KEEP TORVALD
HAPPY UNTIL DINNER.

Archer: AND WHAT ABOUT MY
HAPPINESS, MOTHER?

Malory: OH, WAS THAT NOT
RHETORICAL?

AND IF THE NEEDLE KILLS UTNE, WE
WON'T EVEN GET OUR PER DIEM!

BUT WHAT IF YOU KILL THEM
BOTH?

Archer: NO, I WAS ADDRESSING
YOU AS "HELP."

WHAT'S THE STORY ON THOSE FISH
BALLS?

Archer: WELL, HURRY IT UP,
ALL RIGHT?

ALL I'VE HAD TODAY IS LIKE SIX
GUMMI BEARS AND SOME SCOTCH.

THIS IS WHY I DON'T GET YOU
NICE THINGS.

I CAN'T BELIEVE THEY FELL FOR
THAT.

BUT IF HE'S ON THE PLAN OF
FRAU ARCHER, THEN --

WHAT IF HER PLAN IS A BIG FAT
SETUP?!
WHAT IF THEY MEAN TO KILL US?!

OKAY, SO, NOW WE GO TO
PLAN MANFRED.

ONLY TO PAY FOR EUROPEAN MED
SCHOOL.

LIKE TO GET A PHYSICAL FROM
HER.

Lana: I WONDER IF
DR. PANTY MODEL KNOWS HOW MANY

POUNDS OF PRESSURE IT TAKES TO
SNAP A HUMAN COLLARBONE.

Cyril: SHE PROBABLY USES THE
METRIC SYSTEM.

Pam: YEAH, WHAT DO THEY
USE -- KILOWATTS?

NO. IN THIS CASE,
IT WOULD BE PASCALS.

Lana: I FIND YOUR LACK OF
FAITH DISTURBING.

Cyril: I FIND YOUR MANNISH
HANDS DISTURBING.

Pam: I THINK THEY'RE KIND OF
SEXY.

Malory: BUT KEEP THEM
LIMBERED UP.

I HAVE A BIG SURPRISE PLANNED
FOR DINNER, AND I NEED YOU
READY, LOCKED, AND LOADED!

Lana: YEAH, SO, DO YOU MAYBE
WANT TO LET US IN ON YOUR LITTLE
SCHEME-HATCHERY?

OH, IF I WERE 20 YEARS
YOUNGER!

I CAN MAKE YOU FEEL LIKE YOU
ARE.

I WOULD LIKE, I THINK, THAT
VERY MUCH.

Archer: WELL, THEN GO FIND AN
ATM.
I MUST LEAVE FOR A MOMENT.
HEY, ARE YOU HAVING A GOOD TIME?

KEEP HER OUT OF THE MEDICINE
CABINET!

ONE MORE DEAD BODY IN HERE, AND
THAT BITCH TRUDY BEEKMAN WILL

HAVE ME RIGHT BACK IN FRONT OF
THE CO-OP BOARD!

Archer: WOW, YOU DON'T GET
ALONG WITH YOUR NEIGHBORS
ANYWHERE.

Malory: WHO COULD GET ALONG
WITH A WOMAN WHO WALLPAPERED HER

GUEST BATHROOM WITH VINTAGE
NEW YORKER COVERS?

I AM IN POSITION AND READY TO
ELIMINATE THE TARGET.

Odin will find it much harder to
bribe a dead man for the U.N.

AND I WILL FIND IT MUCH MORE
ENJOYABLE TO WORK WITH THE WOMAN
WHO RUNS ISIS.

Und so I still think you should
let me kill everybody here.

Under no circumstances are you
to harm the hostess, who, um,

whose name I have no way of
knowing.

Archer: HEY, WHAT THE HELL
ARE YOU DOING?!

Archer: NOT FROM THE MEDICINE
CABINET!

SHE SWITCHES ALL THE LABELS ON
HER MEDICINE.

I THINK THERE'S, LIKE, A RACIAL
COMPONENT.

BUT FOR ALL WE KNOW, THIS COULD
BE INSULIN.

OH, YOUR MOTHER IS A
DIABETIC?

WHY DON'T YOU JUST POUR IT ON
EVERYBODY'S?

BECAUSE OUR EMPLOYER WAS VERY
CLEAR -- WE ARE NOT TO HARM THE
HOSTESS.

BUT HER I WANT TO POISON MOST
OF ALL.

Malory: ARE YOU LAZY HUNS
READY OR WHAT?!

I COME OUT SHOOTING BLANKS.
SEE?

UTA IS JUST, UM, POLISHING THE
GUN.

SOME IDIOT DROPPED A FISH BALL
ON MY AZERBAIJANI RUG!
UGH. WHY ARE YOU SO IMMATURE?

Archer: YOU'RE GONNA NEED
SOME CALCIUM AFTER I DO
SOMETHING BAD TO YOUR BONES.
I-I CAN'T HEAR YOU, TINY MAN.

THANKS, MOTHER, FOR REPLACING
THE BABY ASPIRIN WITH LSD!
YOU BOTH HAVE A CLEAR LINE OF...
FORGOT HOW MUCH I HATED THAT.

I KEPT IT ON THE NIGHTSTAND TO
WAKE NANNY WHENEVER STERLING WET
THE BED.

[ Whispering ] IT WAS ALWAYS
"DON'T ASK, DON'T TELL."

THIS ARCHER IS A GIGANTIC
DOUCHE BAG.

Malory: WOODHOUSE, DEAR,
PLEASE HAVE A SEAT.

Lana: AND WHAT IS THIS WE'RE
EATING?

Malory: IT DOES SMELL VAGUELY
POISONOUS.

ARE YOU SURE SHE HAS THE
RIGHT PLATE?

DON'T WORRY -- THIS IS A
NORMAL SMELL!

YES, AND I AM TEMPTED TO GIVE
ISIS THE U.N. CONTRACT, MALORY.

WELL, THAT DEPENDS ON YOUR
FRESTELSE.

TELL ME, MY DEAR, IS IT
TEMPTING?

YOU POISONED MY FOOD OVER A
CONTRACT?!

Malory: TORVALD, I SWEAR I
DIDN'T!

WELL, WHEN I AM FINISHED WITH
ISIS, YOU WON'T BE ABLE TO GET A

CONTRACT FOR A PREPAID MOBILE
PHONE!

I WILL TEAR YOU DOWN, BRICK BY
PERFIDIOUS BRICK!

Lana: WELL, SEE, YOU SAY
THAT...

Malory: BUT THEY WERE BLANKS,
WEREN'T THEY?

Archer: ONLY IF THE BACK OF
HIS SKULL PICKED THAT EXACT
MOMENT TO EXPLODE OUTWARDS.

I SHOULD NOT DO THIS IN MY
CONDITION.

YOUR ONLY CONDITION IS THAT YOU
ARE A STUPID, CRAZY GIRL!

DO NOT SPEAK TO ME LIKE A
CHILD, MANFRED!
I HATE WHEN YOU DO THAT!
I THINK YOU LIKE IT, JA!

BECAUSE I THINK YOU HAVE SOME
SERIOUS UND UNRESOLVED ISSUES
WITH YOUR FATHER!

UND MAYBE THAT IS WHY I DATE
A WRINKLED OLD MAN LIKE YOU!
I THINK WE BOTH KNEW IT.

JUST STRANGE TO HEAR IT OUT
LOUD.

Archer: AND THEY DIDN'T DO
ONE DISH.

Malory: THIS IS FUNNY TO
YOU?!

Archer: I ATE A BUNCH OF THAT
LSD YOU HAD LABELED AS BABY
ASPIRIN.

THAT RUG WAS A GIFT FROM THE
AZERI KHAN HIMSELF!

AND BESIDES, WE'RE NOT GOING
FAR.

IS THAT HARD TO DO WITH THOSE
BIG OL' BALLPARK
FRANKEN-FINGERS?

Malory: HURRY UP -- THE
BEEKMANS WILL BE BACK ANYTIME.

Archer: GOD, CYRIL, WOULD YOU
GO?

Cyril: I SHOULD BE CARRYING
HER.

Archer: CYRIL, I PAID HER, I
GET TO CARRY HER CORPSE.
Pam: I KIND OF LIKE IT.

ALL RIGHT, DROP THEM THERE, NEXT
TO THAT AWFUL LOUIS QUINZE
REPRO.

WE WANT THIS TO LOOK LIKE A
CLASSIC HOOKER/MURDER/SUICIDE.

CYRIL, TAKE STERLING'S GUN, AND
PUMP A ROUND INTO HIS
PROSTITUTE.

THAT WAY, WE'RE ALL IN IT
TOGETHER.

THINK OF IT AS A TEAM-BUILDING
EXERCISE.

Cyril: BUT ODIN GETS TO GO ON
OUTWARD BOUND!

Malory: WELL, ODIN CAN SUCK
IT!

Archer: GOD, CYRIL, THAT
WAS PATHETIC.

NOW, STERLING, DROP YOUR GUN
BETWEEN THE BODIES, AND --
THIS IS ALREADY LIKE CLUE TOWN.

Malory: CYRIL, CALL 911 FROM
THEIR PHONE, AND LEAVE IT OFF
THE HOOK, AND -- STERLING!

Archer: BUT THIS GUN -- IT
WAS A GIFT!

Archer: WE STILL DIDN'T GET
THE U.N. CONTRACT.

AND I'LL GET TO SEE
TRUDY BEEKMAN TRY TO EXPLAIN

THIS LITTLE BARBECUE TO THE
CO-OP BOARD!

Pam: YEAH, I'M KIND OF
HUNGRY.

Malory: IT WOULD BE WEIRDER
IF YOU WEREN'T.

Cyril: WELL, THIS TORTE'S A
WINNER, MALORY.

I THOUGHT WE WERE LAUGHING AT
THE DEAD PEOPLE WE SET ON FIRE.
